metadata.title: CVE-2018-5407 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Simultaneous Multi-threading (SMT) in processors can enable local users to exploit software vulnerable to timing attacks via a side-channel timing attack on 'port contention'.

advisory.discovered_by: Billy Bob Brumley, Cesar Pereida Garcia, Sohaib ul Hassan, Nicola Tuveri, Alejandro Cabrera Aldaya

notes.note: mdeslaur> this is a hardware issue, but openssl did commit a workaround in 1.1.1, 1.1.0i

criterions.comment: openssl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1-1ubuntu2').
